messages.message: Is there a way to remove the "Instabase Drive" or is there a way to route that drive to an external s3 bucket. Want to leverage a external drive but keep the menu list clean

@joshbronko Any context on why do you want to do this, and where? Is this a sandbox env that we own? "Instabase Drive" is the default drive and its setup is done via a bunch of env vars in the core-platform-service.

This is on all the se instances plus ib.com (http://ib.com). We want to have a new org space with a shared drive across them all. I just wanted a clean look in file explorer to ensure people donâ€™t save on the local drive
